post/2009/Small Updates

date

2009-02-26
tags

note/2009

I’m going through the site and doing little updates here and there. Mostly formatting, but every so often there’s new content. For example: my Seattle page has a new blurb about the Green Lake neighborhood.

There’s also a pretty big update in Perl content. post/2005/Perl Babysteps has been updated to use chromatic’s Modern::Perl module. It’s easier than explaining why we always want to use strict, use warnings, and use 5.010. Other pages have been updated and revised to reflect my changing views - for example, Perl 6 is actually here in a build-it-yourself fashion, so no use complaining about how it’s not out yet.
